headline: Under an evil aspect is tears
description: A symbolic drawing of a mask-like face, grinning while turquoise tears fall beneath fiery and patterned designs. The work explores danger, beauty, and sorrow intertwined in archetypal form.
author: Aleksandr Agnitio
whyItMatters: Captures an emergent Totem image, visually embodying sorrow and danger. Its archetypal resonance deepens the symbolic record of masks and tears in Bloom.

motifMap.meaning: A consuming face that hides true form
Sorrow emerging under an evil guise
Intensity of passion and danger woven into identity

articleExcerpt: It is a mask that eats the face.
